target.description: Target information to run task on

connect-timeout.description: How long Bolt should wait when establishing connections

tmpdir.description: The directory to upload and execute temporary files on the target

ssl.description: When true, Bolt will use https connections for WinRM

ssl-verify.description: When true, verifies the targets certificate matches the cacert

cacert.description: The path to the CA certificate

extensions.description: List of file extensions that are accepted for scripts or tasks

interpreters.description: Map of file extensions to remote executable

file-protocol.description: Protocol for file transfer, WinRM or SMB

parameters.description: JSON formatted parameters to be provided to task
